body_html: I think that's a different "sampled softmax" ;) , the one I was referring to is to condition on a sample (either from the model, or from the ground truth; see Bengio et al, NIPS 2015), as opposed to the "sampled softmax" for estimating the partition function.... very confusing I know : )
body_text: I think that's a different "sampled softmax" ;) , the one I was referring to is to condition on a sample (either from the model, or from the ground truth; see Bengio et al, NIPS 2015), as opposed to the "sampled softmax" for estimating the partition function.... very confusing I know : )
body: I think that's a different "sampled softmax" ;) , the one I was referring to is to condition on a sample (either from the model, or from the ground truth; see Bengio et al, NIPS 2015), as opposed to the "sampled softmax" for estimating the partition function.... very confusing I know : )
